name: Sailor
equipment: A belaying pin (club), 50 feet of silk rope, a lucky charm, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp
description: You sailed on a ship for years, learning the trade and the ways of the sea.

name: Acolyte
equipment: A holy symbol, a prayer book or prayer wheel, 5 sticks of incense, vestments, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 15 gp
description: You have spent your life in the service of a temple to a specific god or pantheon of gods.

name: Soldier
toolProficiencies: One type of gaming set, Vehicles (land)
equipment: An insignia of rank, a trophy taken from a fallen enemy, a set of bone dice or deck of cards, a set of common clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp
description: You have fought in battles and learned the ways of war firsthand.

name: Urchin
equipment: A small knife, a map of the city you grew up in, a pet mouse, a token to remember your parents by, a set of common clothes, and a pouch containing 10 gp
description: You grew up on the streets, learning to fend for yourself.

name: Noble
equipment: A set of fine clothes, a signet ring, a scroll of pedigree, and a purse containing 25 gp
description: You were born and raised in a family of high social standing.

name: Outlander
equipment: A staff, a hunting trap, a trophy from an animal you killed, a set of travelerâ€™s clothes, and a belt pouch containing 10 gp
description: You grew up in the wilds, away from civilization.

name: Criminal
toolProficiencies: One type of gaming set, Thieves' tools
equipment: A crowbar, a set of dark common clothes including a hood, and a belt pouch containing 15 gp
description: You have a history of breaking the law, whether for personal gain or survival.

name: Hermit
equipment: A scroll case stuffed full of notes, a winter blanket, a set of common clothes, a herbalism kit, and 5 gp
description: You spent a long period in seclusion, pondering life's mysteries.
